trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event, or using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> object to set properties, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface calls the UpdateDesignTimeHtml method for you.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 호출 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>이벤트 또는 사용 하는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>속성을 설정 하는 개체는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>드립니다 UpdateDesignTimeHtml 메서드를 호출 하는 인터페이스입니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 HTML 태그를 생성 하는 임시 미리 보기 컨트롤을 사용 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns a temporary copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: UsePreviewControl 속성이 `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>속성 컨트롤의 임시 복사본을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted to the document.
trans-unit.target: 임시 컨트롤에 대 한 변경 문서에 유지 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property returns an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property for the control.
trans-unit.target: UsePreviewControl 속성이 `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>속성의 인스턴스를 반환 합니다.는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>컨트롤에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the instance of the control are persisted.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 인스턴스 변경 내용은 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object is used to set the value of the UsePreviewControl property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>에서 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>개체 UsePreviewControl 속성의 값을 설정 하는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting determines the type of control that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 따라서의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>설정은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>기본 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 에서 속성</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> 에서 반환 하는 컨트롤의 종류를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property as `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>컨트롤 디자이너 선언에 지정 되지 않은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>개체 동작은를 지정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>속성으로 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*> property for the control contained in the control designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>을 컨트롤 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 미리 보기에 대 한 컨트롤의 임시 복사본을 사용 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>컨트롤 디자이너에서 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>컨트롤 디자이너에 포함 된 컨트롤에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Web server control that can be used for previewing the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임 HTML 태그를 미리 보기 위해 사용할 수 있는 웹 서버 컨트롤을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ViewControl property uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to determine its return value.
trans-unit.target: ViewControl 속성에서 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>속성 반환 값을 결정 하도록 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `true`, the ViewControl property returns a temporary copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>속성은 `true`, ViewControl 속성 컨트롤의 임시 복사본을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the temporary control are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 임시 컨트롤에 대 한 변경 내용이 유지 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is `false`, the ViewControl property returns an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> property for the control.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>속성은 `false`, ViewControl 속성의 인스턴스를 반환 합니다.는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A>컨트롤에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes to the instance of the control are persisted.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 인스턴스 변경 내용은 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> object is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>에서 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>개체의 값을 설정 하는 데 사용 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> setting determines the type of control that is returned by the ViewControl property in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 따라서의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>설정은 기본 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 에서 ViewControl 속성에서 반환 하는 컨트롤의 종류를 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is not specified in the control designer declaration, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> object behavior is equivalent to specifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> property as `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>컨트롤 디자이너 선언에 지정 되지 않은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>개체 동작은를 지정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A>속성으로 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute.SupportsPreviewControl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object used by the base class to generate design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> 디자인 타임 HTML 태그를 생성 하는 기본 클래스에 의해 사용 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref uid="langword_csharp_View" name="View" href=""></xref> control has been created for display on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_View" name="View" href=""> </xref> 컨트롤을 디자인 화면에 표시 하기 위해 만든 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if a control has been created for viewing on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컨트롤을 디자인 화면의 보기를 위해 생성 된 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is visible at design time.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 컨트롤 표시 되는지를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>모든 경우
